page.title: 13Canaan Farm Riding Stables
page.content: In the morning the{stable girls}get up at 7.30 and{muck-out}2 or 3 stables.At 9.00 when they have finished they have breakfast. In the week the{lessons}normally start at 4.30 until 8.30.In the weekend the{lessons}start at 9am.until 1pm.and from 2pm.until 4pm. The price of{lessons}for under 12 years is{Â£3.00,}12-16 years{Â£3.50,} over 16 years{Â£4.50.} On Tuesdays there is the{Costock and {District Riding Club.}It is from 7.15pm until 9.15pm.At the Riding Club they do different things like{Musical {Riding,Jumping,Dressage}and{ {Prix-Prili.}
